EmailTemplate.name: 2012 Pat's Run Content Collection
EmailTemplate.subject: Team IAVA and Pat's Run
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for running with Team IAVA in the 2012 Pat's Run and Pat's Run shadow runs.
Whether you are running for competition, camaraderie, or in remembrance of someone, I wish you all the best of luck.
Being a member of Team IAVA, you will be running in unison with hundreds of other IAVA members. Help show your support of Team IAVA by including @IAVA in your tweets and tagging IAVA in your Facebook posts and photos. We'll do our best to share them through our properties - and give you credit!
Also, if you have any photos you would like to share, please send those to us at Patsrun@iava.org.
Thank you and good luck!
Sincerely, Anthony
Anthony Pike Membership Coordinator Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA)
